titleStmt.title: Extract from the Brown Corpus (four samples)

sourceDesc.p: The Brown Corpus of Modern American English, compiled by Nelson Francis and Henry Kucera and rendered in TEI form by Lou Burnard.
A real bibliographic citation would be preferable here, but I'm in a hurry.
